languages.text: "Как вы позаботились обо мне, так и я хочу позаботиться о вас... Чуть сверх оговоренного. Вот, держите: скромный дар в благодарность за помощь. И пусть Великий и дальше оберегает пути, по которым вы ходите".

"You have taken good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."
languages.original_text: "Как вы позаботились обо мне, так и я хочу позаботиться о вас... Чуть сверх оговоренного. Вот, держите: скромный дар в благодарность за помощь. И пусть Великий и дальше оберегает пути, по которым вы ходите".

traits.locale_text: "You have taken good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have taken good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have taken good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have taken good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Ha cuidado bien de mí, y a mí también me gustaría cuidar bien de usted a cambio... e ir un poco más allá de los términos estrictos de nuestro acuerdo. Tome: un pequeño regalo como muestra de gratitud. Y que el Exaltado vigile los caminos que recorra».
languages.original_text: "You have taken good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

traits.locale_text: «Ha cuidado bien de mí, y a mí también me gustaría cuidar bien de usted a cambio... e ir un poco más allá de los términos estrictos de nuestro acuerdo. Tome: un pequeño regalo como muestra de gratitud. Y que el Exaltado vigile los caminos que recorra».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “你对我照顾有加，所以我也希望能照顾到你……并稍微超出我们协议中的严格条款。收下吧，这是我带来的小礼物，带着我的感激之情。愿至高无上的神皇始终指引你的道路。”
languages.original_text: "You have taken good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

traits.locale_text: “你对我照顾有加，所以我也希望能照顾到你……并稍微超出我们协议中的严格条款。收下吧，这是我带来的小礼物，带着我的感激之情。愿至高无上的神皇始终指引你的道路。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あんたはあたしを大切にしてくれた。だから、あたしもあんたを大切にしたい…それからお互いに合意したことからほんの少し踏み出してみよう。ここに、感謝のしるしとしてささやかな贈り物を持ってきたよ。エグザルテッド・ワンが、あんたの進む道を見守ってくださいますように」
languages.original_text: "You have taken good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

traits.locale_text: 「あんたはあたしを大切にしてくれた。だから、あたしもあんたを大切にしたい…それからお互いに合意したことからほんの少し踏み出してみよう。ここに、感謝のしるしとしてささやかな贈り物を持ってきたよ。エグザルテッド・ワンが、あんたの進む道を見守ってくださいますように」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Vous avez pris soin de moi et je tiens à vous renvoyer la pareille... quitte à outrepasser légèrement les termes stricts de notre arrangement. Tenez, je vous ai apporté un petit cadeau en guise de remerciement. Puisse l'Exalté continuer à veiller sur vous à l'avenir. »
languages.original_text: "You have taken good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez pris soin de moi et je tiens à vous renvoyer la pareille... quitte à outrepasser légèrement les termes stricts de notre arrangement. Tenez, je vous ai apporté un petit cadeau en guise de remerciement. Puisse l'Exalté continuer à veiller sur vous à l'avenir. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt Euch gut um mich gekümmert, daher möchte ich mich auch um Euch kümmern ... und leicht über die strikten Bedingungen unserer Vereinbarung hinausgehen. Hier, ich habe Euch ein kleines Geschenk als Zeichen meiner Dankbarkeit mitgebracht. Und möge der Erhabene über die Pfade wachen, die Ihr beschreitet."
languages.original_text: "You have taken good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt Euch gut um mich gekümmert, daher möchte ich mich auch um Euch kümmern ... und leicht über die strikten Bedingungen unserer Vereinbarung hinausgehen. Hier, ich habe Euch ein kleines Geschenk als Zeichen meiner Dankbarkeit mitgebracht. Und möge der Erhabene über die Pfade wachen, die Ihr beschreitet."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "You have taken good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

languages.text: "Bana kol kanat gerdin, ben de aynısını senin için yapmak ve biraz da aramızdaki anlaşmanın belli şartlarının ötesine geçmek istiyorum. Sana minnetimin bir göstergesi olarak küçük bir armağan getirdim. Görkemli, aştığın yollarda seni kollayıp gözetsin."
languages.original_text: "You have taken good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

traits.locale_text: "Bana kol kanat gerdin, ben de aynısını senin için yapmak ve aramızdaki anlaşmanın net şartlarının biraz da ötesine geçmek istiyorum. Sana minnetimin bir göstergesi olarak küçük bir armağan getirdim. Görkemli, geçtiğin yollarda seni kollayıp gözetsin."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
